alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 9:40AM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, heavy at times, occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, bringing snow totals to 4 to 8 inches in the most-persistent snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Cuyahoga and Ashtabula Lakeshore Counties. In Pennsylvania, northern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
